fact1: Over 100 million marine animals die each year from plastic waste alone.
fact2: Deforestation is responsible for about 15% of global greenhouse gas emissions.
fact3: The Earth loses 18.7 million acres of forests per year, equivalent to 27 soccer fields every minute.
fact4: It takes 500 years for an aluminum can to decompose in a landfill.
fact5: Renewable energy sources currently generate about 30% of the world's total energy demand.
fact6: One-third of all food produced in the world is wasted, amounting to about 1.3 billion tons annually.
